page.title: 08FARMING ROUND WYDDIAL
page.content: The map names 8 outlying farms. There are also Home and Wyddial Bury Farms in the village. North End Farm Beauchamps and Moles are private houses with an acre or two of land still attached. New Barns in the east has farmbuildings but no house. It is worked as part of a farm in Anstey. Silkmead was a poultry farm. Within the last 5 years the buildings have been converted for light industry. Racing stables occupy most of the Holding. Cave Gate buildings are workshops for an agricultural engineer. All the land formerly attached to these has been amalgamated into larger units. Only three_ Biggin Manor, Wyddial Bury and Home Farms are still working farms. Some tied cottages no longer needed for farm workers have been sold off.
